title.rendered: Write for Us – Namaste India Trip

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column]

    Write For Us. It’s Easy!

    No Experience Necessary. Immediate Start.

    We are currently looking for people all over the world to work for us as freelance Travel Writers. You do not need to be travelling – you can write travel guides about the place you live or travelled. We have various levels of pay-per-article and the signup process is very simple.

    [vc_column_text]

    Payment via Paypal, on Fridays.

    > Work from anywhere, anytime.

    > Become a published writer

    > Start a career as a freelance writer.

    Launch your freelance career on this amazing platform.

    WRITING GUIDELINES:

    • Authentic – we cannot accept any piece of writing that has been published anywhere else on the Internet. Google doesn’t like it and we listen when they talk.
    • An Article ranges between 500-2000 words and can be on a number of travel topics such as ‘Tips for first-time visitors to Varanasi’ traveller tips for beginners.
    • You can also send videos’s, or embed codes for videos you’ve uploaded to Youtube.
    • Please also send a profile picture of yourself and a short Bio including links to your social profiles and blog.

    Please note that we retain editorial control on any content submitted. By submitting content to us you confirm that you will not submit it to any other website and that all content submitted (text, images, videos etc) belongs to you.

    WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?

    If you have an idea or even a story that’s ready to go – get in touch with us and we’ll get the ball rolling

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
